sourcesContent: import React from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { Container, Button } from "../../globalStyles"; import { InfoSec, InfoRow, InfoColumn, TextWrapper, TopLine, Heading, Subtitle, ImgWrapper, Img, SectionTitle } from "./Work.elements"; function IntroSection({ primary, lightBg, topLine, lightTopLine, lightText, lightTextDesc, headline, description, buttonLabel, img, alt, imgStart, start }) { return ( <> WORK AND EXPERIENCE 9 Apr-2021- (Continuing) Assistant Professor - Mathematics Humanities and Science Department, CVR College of Engineering, Ibrahimpatinam, Hyderabad, India., Courses Taught: Mathematics for computing, Mathematics II 18 Dec 2020- 30 Mar 2021 Assistant Professor - Mathematics General Department, Govt. Polytechnic College, Meppadi, Wayanad, Kerala, India, Courses Taught: Basic Mathematics (Polytechnic). 1 Sep 2020 - 17 Dec 2020 Assistant Professor - Mathematics, Nilgiri College of Arts and Science, Tamil Nadu, India, Courses Taught: Linear Algebra, Abstract Algebra (B. Sc. Mathematics). 30 Nov 2018 - 19 Dec 2019 Senior Research Fellow Department of Mathematics, National Institute of Technology Calicut, Calicut, Kerala, India. 15 Jul 2016 - 29 Nov 2018 Junior Research Fellow Department of Mathematics, National Institute of Technology Calicut, Calicut, Kerala, India. 1 Jul 2014 - 15 jan 2015 Lecturer Nilgiri College of Arts and Science, Tamil Nadu, India, Courses Taught: Real Analysis, Graph Theory (B. Sc. Mathematics) . ); } export default IntroSection;
